title: La Cage aux Folles 3: the wedding
creator_credit: Georges Lautner, Marcello Danon, Da Ma Produzione and Columbia Films
brief_description: Third and final installment of the “La Cage aux Folles” comedies begins with the St. Tropez nightclub of the title in serious financial trouble. When club owner Renato learns that his lover and the club’s star drag artiste Albin, is about to inherit a vast fortune from a distant relative, he thinks his problems are solved. But the gay couple’s long running relationship is thrown into chaos when they find out there are strings attached. Albin must marry and produce a heir within eighteen months or the whole inheritance will be forfeited. Despite consultations with marriage brokers and all the best intentions, it seems nothing will assist Albin reach his reward - until help arrives in an unlikely form. Cast includes Ugo Tognazzi, Marcel Bozzuffi, Michel Galabru and Antonella Interlenghi. In French with English subtitles.
